items.question: What is a waitlist management system?
items.answer: A waitlist management system is a digital solution that helps businesses manage customer queues efficiently. It replaces paper lists and pagers with SMS notifications, real-time updates, and analytics to improve the customer experience and reduce walk-aways.

items.question: What kind of businesses benefit from a waitlist management system like WaitQ?
items.answer: WaitQ is designed for any business with walk-in heavy traffic. Think bars, bakeries or restaurants of all types: from fast casual, trendy brunch spots, to gourmet spots.

items.question: Do we need to purchase hardware?
items.answer: No. WaitQ works on any device with a web browser - tablets, phones, or computers you already own. No special hardware, pagers, or equipment needed.

items.question: What if guests prefer not to use technology, or don't have a phone?
items.answer: No problem. Staff can manually add guests to the waitlist and call their name when ready. WaitQ supports both digital and traditional approaches.

items.question: Can we customize the check-in page?
items.answer: Yes! You can customize the check-in page with your logo, colors, and branding to match your business identity.

items.question: Do customers need to download an app to use WaitQ?
items.answer: No. Customers receive SMS text messages with a link to track their place in line. They can view their status from any web browser without downloading anything.

items.question: Can you show me a live demo of the waitlist in operation before I try?
items.answer: Absolutely! Contact us and we'll schedule a live demo to show you how WaitQ works in a real restaurant environment.

items.question: Is WaitQ easy to set up?
items.answer: Yes! WaitQ can be set up in under 5 minutes. Simply create an account, configure your waitlist settings, and you're ready to start managing your queue.
